article_text:
Ohio State's marching band earns its "Best Damn Band In The Land" nickname. From Michael Jackson themed shows to dinosaurs swallowing people whole OSU's band has not disappointed this season.

And Saturday at the Indiana-Ohio State game they brought out another amazing performance, a salute to the Battle of Gettysburg from 1863. Here's a GIF from @corkgaines, and you can watch the whole video below:

article_summary:
Ohio State's marching band earns its "Best Damn Band In The Land" nickname.
And Saturday at the Indiana-Ohio State game they brought out another amazing performance, a salute to the Battle of Gettysburg from 1863.
From Michael Jackson themed shows to dinosaurs swallowing people whole OSU's band has not disappointed this season.
Here's a GIF from @corkgaines, and you can watch the whole video below:
